name: InstallMATLAB
description: Install the latest MATLAB release on a Linux-based Microsoft-hosted agent. Currently, this task is available only for public projects and does not include transformation products, such as MATLAB Coder and MATLAB Compiler.
author: The MathWorks, Inc.

messages.InstallNotSupportedOnSelfHosted: The install task is not supported on self-hosted agents. Use the standard MATLAB installer to install MATLAB on this system.
messages.FailedToExecuteInstallScript: Failed to execute install script. Exited with code '%s'.
